title: TeslaReli — Supercharger Reliability Cockpit
tagline: Reliability intelligence for Tesla’s Supercharger and fleet operations.
problem: Supercharger outages and peak-time congestion reduce driver satisfaction and increase operational firefighting for regional service teams.
impact: Improved uptime visibility through real-time health monitoring of Supercharger stations.
Predictive congestion modeling to optimize load balancing across a region.
Prioritized maintenance recommendations ranked by customer impact.
description: TeslaReli is an internal cockpit designed for Tesla’s charging infrastructure and fleet operations teams.
It centralizes Supercharger network health, predictive congestion modeling, and maintenance prioritization into a single operational pane of glass.
